casename: Vignes s/o Mourthi v Public Prosecutor (No 3)
coram: Chao Hick Tin JA; Tan Lee Meng J; Yong Pung How CJ
counsel: Mr M Ravi (M Ravi and Co) for appellant; Bala Reddy and Edwin San (Deputy Public Prosecutors) for respondent
tags-parsed: Criminal Procedure and Sentencing/Court of Appeal/Criminal jurisdiction/Application for leave to grant applicant re -trial/Leave to stay sentence of death pending re-trial/Whether Court of Appeal has jurisdiction to allow another appeal after appeal against conviction heard and dismissed/Function of Court of Appeal/Supreme Court of Judicature Act (Cap 322, 1999 Rev Ed)

Criminal Procedure and Sentencing/Court of Appeal/Criminal jurisdiction/Whether need for different coram to be convened to hear second appeal before Court of Appeal/Burden on appellant to show strong reasons why permanent members of Court of Appeal would be unable to act objectively in matter
